title: Tomato and Fish Stew
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons olive oil', '4 sticks celery', '1/2 onion, diced', '3 carrots, diced', '3 cloves garlic, diced', '1 (400g) tin stewed tomatoes', '475ml water', '235ml white wine', '235ml fish stock', '60ml sherry', '2 chicken stock cubes', '1/2 teaspoon dried chilli flakes', '1 pinch salt and pepper to taste', '225g medium peeled prawns', '225g white fish, such as cod or halibut, cut into small chunks', '1/2 bunch fresh coriander, chopped']
